flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Two of my favorite parts about Halloween are the haunted houses that scare and the costumes we wear--so why not combine the two into a delightfully ghoulish and homey ensemble? This is how I created a smaller version of my very own haunted house and wore it all around town.
guide.introduction_rendered: Two of my favorite parts about Halloween are the haunted houses that scare and the costumes we wear--so why not combine the two into a delightfully ghoulish and homey ensemble? This is how I created a smaller version of my very own haunted house and wore it all around town.
guide.summary: Create a mobile home of terror to delight fellow Halloweeners
guide.title: Haunted Dollhouse Costume
